Class EscXml

java.lang.Object
  com.evanmclean.evlib.escape.EscXml

public final class EscXml
extends Object

Escapes character escaping suitable for XML output.

Author:
Evan McLean McLean Computer Services (see the overview for copyright and licensing.)
